Sykesville is an example of a mill town, common in this region, where much of the history is preserved, on the Patapsco river.
Route 26 and Route 32 both pass through Sykesville. There is NO mass transit in Carroll County-westward, so you will have to drive.
Walk or drive around Sykesville. There are some walking areas, but a lot of driving areas.

There are no places to sleep in Sykesville, the closest hotels being in Owings Mills.
